```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(distill)
```


```{r, echo= FALSE}
raw_data <- read_csv(file = "drug-use-by-age.csv")
```

```{r}
clean_data <- raw_data %>%
  group_by(age) %>%
  select(`alcohol-use`) %>%
  mutate(`alcohol-use` = factor(`alcohol-use`))


clean_data %>%
  ggplot( mapping = aes(x = age, y= `alcohol-use`)) +
  geom_jitter()


```
